prompt_template:
Analyze this voice note transcript and provide:
1. A summary in 5 words or less
2. The most appropriate tag from this list: todo, note, misc

Transcript:
{{transcript}}

Respond in this exact JSON format only, no other text:
{"summary": "your 5 word summary", "tag": "chosen tag"}
transcripts: Pick up some milk and eggs on the way home from work today.
The server migration is scheduled for 2 AM on Saturday to minimize downtime.
I really like the coffee at that new place on 5th street, much better than the office.
Need to remember to fix the bug in the authentication middleware before the sprint ends.
The weather today is surprisingly warm for December, I might go for a walk later.
Call the dentist to reschedule my appointment for next Tuesday afternoon.
The customer feedback for the new UI has been mostly positive except for the font size.
Was thinking about that movie I saw last night, the ending was really confusing.
Submit the quarterly expense report by Friday afternoon at the latest.
The logs show a sudden spike in latency every time the database backup starts.
